title: Kendall Jenner's #hearthair selfie is a trend on Instagram
text: Updated: Jul 28, 2015 15:38 IST Kendall Jenner's #hearthair picture is the most liked photo on Instagram. (Instagram/Kendall Jenner) Like all true style icons, wherever Kendall Jenner leads, 32 million Instagram fans follow, and now the model has once more proven the extent of her influence by starting the new trend for "heart hair" selfies.The US beauty kick-started the movement earlier in the summer when she posted this picture of herself lying on the floor in a gorgeous white lacy dress with her brunette locks spread out around her face, arranged into a halo of heart shapes. She captioned the photo with a simple heart emoji. A photo posted by @thinay11 on Jul 27, 2015 at 6:01am PDT The cute snap struck a chord with hair and beauty lovers everywhere, and has since garnered a staggering 2.9 million double taps to become the most-liked photo on Instagram -- bumping big sister Kim, who previously held the title for her wedding snap with Kanye, off the top spot.Long-haired social media users immediately set about recreating the pose themselves, and #hearthair is now definitely a thing, with 7,683 photos and counting. From a great way to show off rainbow hair to braids, Instagrammers are delicately arranging their tendrils into romantic compositions. A photo posted by Geneva Anne (@vividkisses) on Jul 26, 2015 at 12:46am PDT And the trend isn't just for girls -- men, women and children have all been getting in on the act.Some of our favorites include this ballerina pose by @aviouslymee titled "Channeling Kendall Jenner", an ombre 'do by @sarahjaemie captioned "Our hearts linger where least expected" and a rose petal version by @lucy.r.smith. A photo posted by Christopher Oppenhuis (@cedarcottontrail) on Jul 21, 2015 at 4:16pm PDT Kendall's Instagram presence is on the rise, with the model using her account to showcase her recent high-profile fashion campaigns such as those for Fendi and Balmain, as well as sharing behind-the-scenes fashion shots and "off duty" moments with her family, the raucous Kardashian clan.
